document_data.name: Ki
document_data.title: Lion's Friend
document_data.cleric alignments2e: {{Alignment grid | off | off | off | off | on | off | off | off | off }}
document_data.mainbody: '''Ki''' was the [[Untheric pantheon|Untheric goddess]] of nature. Her manifestation on [[Toril]] was killed during the [[Orcgate Wars]]. Her symbol was the [[Wikipedia:Iris (plant)|iris]].
document_data.Description: Ki manifested as a beautiful, petite woman with delicate features. She could not be touched by anything thrown through the air at her, and at will she could change her shape into any non-monstrous form. She could summon up to one hundred of any creature of the [[beast]] type, though only one species at a time and no species could be summoned more than once per week. She took half damage from any attack.
document_data.Relationships: Ki helped maintain relationships between the other Untheric powers and between such gods of earth as [[Silvanus]] and [[Mielikki]].
document_data.History: Ki came to [[Toril]] with the other Untheric deities aboard the ''[[Galley of the Gods]]''. She was killed by one of the [[orc pantheon|orcish gods]] in {{Yearlink|-1071}}, and her body was laid to rest in a God-Tomb in [[Unther]].
